name: participation-nation
description: This project simplifies public sector info about elections.

scripts.install: npm install express mongoose && npm install react --prefix client
scripts.install-dev: npm install express mongoose concurrently && npm install react --prefix client
scripts.powershell-install: npm install express mongoose concurrently; cd client; npm install react react-dom react-scripts bootstrap
scripts.heroku-postbuild: NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false npm install --prefix client && npm run build --prefix client
